meanings.definition: Able to be used for a practical purpose or in several ways.
meanings.sent1: The toolbox is very useful for fixing things around the house.
meanings.sent2: Having a map is useful when you are exploring a new place.
meanings.sent3: It was quite useful to have an umbrella when unexpected rain poured down.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like a useful compass guiding me through tough decisions.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight proved to be incredibly useful during the power outage.

meanings.definition: Providing help or assistance in achieving a goal or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The calculator is a useful tool for solving math problems quickly.
meanings.sent2: A supportive friend can be very useful when facing challenges.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel found a useful way to store nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words were a useful shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is having a useful strategy in place.
